thesis.description: In the United Kingdom specific power is conferred upon both the Minister of Transport and Civil Aviation and the Local Authorities to establish aerodromes for the purposes of civil aviation by virtue of The Civil Aviation Act, 1949. Under Section 16 of the Act:- "(1) The Minister may for the purposes of civil aviation establish and maintain aerodromes and provide and maintain in connection therewith roads, approaches, apparatus, equipment, and buildings and other accommodation: [...]
